description: A chicken pasta bake recipe inspired by Tuscan flavours. This delicious recipe is from Woolworths team member Darlene Toynton from the Cooloola store.
name: Tuscan Chicken Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths COOK chicken breast parcels with spinach & ricotta
1 cup baby spinach leaves, coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook chicken parcels according to packet instructions.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a saucepan of salted, boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain.

Heat butter in a large deep frying pan over medium heat. Cook mushrooms and garlic, stirring, for 4 minutes or until mushrooms are golden. Add tomato and stock, and stir to combine. Stir in cream and parmesan and bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 2 minutes or until sauce thickens. Season.

Add pasta, spinach and half the tasty cheese to mushroom mixture and stir to combine. Transfer pasta mixture to a large baking dish. Thickly slice chicken and place over pasta mixture. Sprinkle with remaining tasty cheese. Preheat grill to medium-high. Grill for 3 minutes or until cheese is golden. Serve.
